name: Session
description: Management of session used by other plugins.

SESSION_SECRET.help: Secret used to encrypt sessions variables for storing data related to challenges.
SESSION_SECRET.label: Session secret

SESSION_NAME.help: Name of the cookie given to clients.
SESSION_NAME.label: Session name

SESSION_IDLING_TIMEOUT.help: Maximum time (in seconds) of inactivity before the session is invalidated.
SESSION_IDLING_TIMEOUT.label: Session idling timeout

SESSION_ROLLING_TIMEOUT.help: Maximum time (in seconds) before a session must be renewed.
SESSION_ROLLING_TIMEOUT.label: Session rolling timeout

SESSION_ABSOLUTE_TIMEOUT.help: Maximum time (in seconds) before a session is destroyed.
SESSION_ABSOLUTE_TIMEOUT.label: Session absolute timeout
